p: Using the point-frame method described by Walker ( 1996), Gould and Mercado-Díaz (in Shaver et al. 2014) monitored the response of plant communities to ambient climate in 155 permanent plots. Measurements were made at 5- to 7-year intervals since 1989 in two 1 km 2 grids set up by Walker et al. ( 1989) at Toolik Lake and nearby Imnavait Creek. This monitoring was a part of the International Tundra Experiment (ITEX).
